link.title: Pine Bluffs Jr./Sr. High School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: All LCSD#2 schools will remain closed, and we will continue with our adaptive learning plan for the remainder of this school year.

a.title: Laramie County School District #2 CMS Login

span.p: New secondary grading guidelines for remote learning are now available. Please click on the news title for more information.
LCSD#2 May 2020 School COW/Board Meeting is combined and to be held via Zoom Webinar on May 6th at 7:00 pm. Click news title for more information.

Help show our food service staff how much we appreciate them with a curbside cheer or a drive-by car horn to show your appreciation on Wednesday 4/19 at any of our elementary serving locations from 9-11 am.
Laramie County School District #2 is seeking bids to purchase 1 vehicle. Bid documents will be accepted until 3:00 PM MST on April 29, 2020. Click the news title for more information.

a.title: HS Track @ Kelly Walsh Invite- Cancelled

div.a: HS Track @ Kelly Walsh Invite- Cancelled

div.p: We hire employees who are passionate about education and wish to build a brighter future for our students. If you are motivated and willing to make a difference in the lives of our students, please visit our online portal to view current employment opportunities and/or to submit an application.

ul.li: Dale Gilbert - Wyoming Coaches Association Assistant Girls Basketball Coach of the Year for 2019-20 Winter Sports Season.
Anne Schatz - Wyoming Outstanding Young Music Educator of the Year 2020.
Christina Nusbaum - LCSD#2 Teacher of the year 2019-2020
Dustin Lee - 2A Girls' Track Coach of the Year.
Cole Manlove - NHSACA Coach of the Year finalist - Girls Cross Country 2018-2019.
Shawnae Branigan - WPTA School Bus Safety Competition - 1st place in Transit class, June 2019.
Jeff Munoz - WPTA School Bus Safety Competition - 2nd place in Conventional class, June 2019.
Val Martin - WPTA School Bus Safety Competition - 3rd place in Transit class, June 2019.
Kay Dersham - School Nurse of the Year 2018-2019.
Dustin Lee - LCSD2 Teacher of the year for 2018-2019.

a.title: Laramie County School District #2 CMS Login

div.p: Laramie County School District No.2 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission or access to, or treatment or employment in, its education programs or activities. Inquiries concerning Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 may be referred to Nancy Malcolm, Director of Special Services, P.O. Box 489, Pine Bluffs, WY 82082, 307-245-4050. Inquiries related to any civil rights concern may also be addressed to the Office for Civil Rights, U.S. Department of Education, 1961 Stout Street, Denver, Colorado 80294.
